name: The Unbeatable Dice
description:
You were captured by an evil wizard! He gives you one last chance, and lets you roll the dice to get 1 of 3 powers to survive in his cruel game. He's not all fair though, as he enters the arena himself and makes himself unbeatable to hurt you!

Controls:
WASD to move

Mouse to Attack

Credits:
Gameplay: Me

Artpack: https://stevepixelface.itch.io/1-bit-dungeon-brawler-asset-pack

Music: (Technicaly not from this pack, he removed the original pack that I bought, but the music is included in this pack) https://stevenmelin.itch.io/game-music-treasury
